title: Modern 2 BD, 10 min to Harvard Sq T, Laundry, HWD FL
posting_body: ['Harvard Square / Central Square area, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.', 'A quick, 10-minute walk to the Harvard Square', '[T] stop.', ' The modern eat-in kitchen features dishwasher, disposal, electric range, microwave, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Has 1  off-street parking space available for an additional fee.', 'Features of note include air conditioning, hardwood floors, an intercom system, a living room and  a modern bath.', '2 Bed, 1 Bath ⋅ $3400 ⋅ Full Fee', 'Available September 1, 2022', '‣ 10-Minute Walk To Harvard Square', '[T]', '‣ Laundry (In-Building: Coin)', '‣ Off-Street Parking (1 Space)', '‣ Hardwood Floors', '‣ Dishwasher & Disposal', '‣ Granite Countertops', '‣ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'CALL CLAUDIA AT 617-331-8803 FOR THIS AND MORE LISTINGS OR EMAIL ME AT CLAUDIAatMAVENREALTY.COM']
